page.title: 13TRANSPORT TO SCHOOL CONT.
page.content: DISTANCE: The school is located in Halmerend.However,only 14% of the pupils live in the village (i.e.<1km away).This is unusual because schools are normally located near the centre of their catchment area.The majority of pupils actually come from Bignall End and Audley,the two largest villages in the parish.Halmerend sends so few pupils because it is no longer as important as it used to be. TIME: It is very difficult to explain the results because 66% take <20mins which suggests they either live close by or they have a short car or bus journey.The other 34% take >20mins which suggests they either have a long walk or they travel a long distance by bike or motor. Timothy Myatt.
